example.text: The Battle of Cable Street saw rioting against the Metropolitan Police as they attempted to facilitate a march by the British Union of Fascists
example.arg: as they attempted to facilitate a march by the British Union of Fascists
example.note: Here, it seems like the riot was directed towards the police, but that the police weren't the ultimate reason for the riot. So we called this one GOL.
